trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Thanks to your celestial heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Cold Adapted
trait.text: You have resistance to cold damage.

trait.name: Natural Hunter
trait.text: You gain proficiency with hand axe's and spears.

trait.name: Mountain Tracker
trait.text: You gain advantage to Wisdom (Survival) checks to track creatures in mountainous terrain.

trait.name: Mountain Born
trait.text: You’re acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 0,000 feet. You’re also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master’s Guide.

trait.name: Sun Adapted
trait.text: Due to the way these orc's have lived over the many generaions they have become accustomed to the sun and have over come their sunlight sensitivity.

trait.name: Aggressive
trait.text: Once per short rest, as a bonus action you can move up to your speed towards a hostile creature more then 5ft away that you can see.

trait.name: Battle Ready
trait.text: Proficiency with Great axe's and Lances.

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
trait.text: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but are not killed out right, you can drop to 1 hp instead. Can only be used once per long rest.

trait.name: Savage Attacks
trait.text: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.
